mapper.select: select '登录情况' as label,t1.dates as analysisTime,IFNULL(t2.analysisCount, 0) analysisValue from ( select * from ( SELECT @v_day := @v_day + 1 AS indexs, DATE_FORMAT( DATE( DATE_SUB( CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL @v_day DAY ) ), '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS dates FROM mysql.help_topic, ( SELECT @v_day := -1 ) temp ORDER BY indexs) t limit #{day}) t1 LEFT JOIN (select date_format(a.create_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') AS analysisTime, count(1) as analysisCount from sys_log_login a where a.operation = #{operation} group by date_format(a.create_time ,'%Y-%m-%d')) t2 on t1.dates = t2.analysisTime order by t1.dates
